title: Stayer Cycles Now Offers Full Ingrid Components and GravAlloy Wheel Completes
content:
It ain’t easy to put together a full bike build these days. Stayer Cycles have come up with an exciting solution to the lack of available complete bike options in collaboration with Ingrid Components and GravAlloy wheels. Continue reading below for more details!

STAYER builds are available NOW to pre-order!

And we don’t mean pre-order for next October or ‘put your name down and maybe we will get back to you in 2029. It’s hard right now to build bikes but let this be your tonic. Support small manufacturing, get on yer bike and dip your toe in the custom world of bicycle beautilishiousness with some pretty damn hot full bike builds from STAYER with some nifty Ingrid Components bits and pieces and a full bike pre-order option for our NEW Gravalloy wheels. It’s seriously spectgravular!

Currently taking orders for full bike builds NOW for delivery in Jan/Feb 2022

Either 11 spd mechanical (which ain’t dead no matter what the big’uns have you believe) or 12spd mechanical! Indeed you did hear correctly as with the tech wizardry of Ratio Technology your (new) or old 10 or 11spd SRAM shifters can be upgraded to run some pretty sweet INGRID gearing. Lots of gears, loads of colours, patented STAYER ‘your bike’ technology and full on ‘hug a small business’ feels as you’re rollin’ in the fields.

For full build kit specs and pricing details, visit Stayer Cycles and Full Ingrid Build.
